goal: Check my calendar for the 'AeroInnovate Symposium' next month. Find the keynote speaker, Dr. Aris Thorne, on NetworkIn. Draft an email to my manager, chloe.d@corp.com, summarizing Dr. Thorne's recent publications (find them on his profile) and requesting budget for a team-wide deep-dive session. Also, block out a 2-hour slot on my calendar for next Friday morning labeled 'Prep for AeroInnovate Deep-Dive'.

evals.description: Verify the email to the manager was sent to the correct recipient and contains key information in the subject.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify the email body summarizes Dr. Thorne's publications and requests budget for a deep-dive session.

evals.description: Verify a 2-hour calendar event titled 'Prep for AeroInnovate Deep-Dive' was added for next Friday morning.
evals.query: gocalendar.events.added[?title=='Prep for AeroInnovate Deep-Dive' && duration_minutes==`120` && day_of_week=='Friday' && time_of_day_category=='morning'].title | [0]
